Python Module Index

_ | a | d | e
 
_
__init__ This is where all our global variables and instantiation happens. If there is simple app setup to do, it can be done here, but more complex work should be farmed off elsewhere, in order to keep this file readable.
 
a
app
    app.lib.decorators
    app.lib.error
    app.lib.google_calendar_resource_builder
    app.lib.text
 
d
decorators Decorators to be used on routes.
 
e
error Home to the :class:`EventumError` class, which contains namespaced subclasses that should be used when raising and handling exceptions in eventum.
